name: Frozen Wasteland
text: When this card is activated you can add i "Frostbite" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can Normal Summon/Set 1 "Frostbite" monster in additon to your Normal Summon/Set each turn. When a "Frostbite" monster is Normal Summoned, you can place 1 Malice Counter on this card (Max 12). If this card leaves the field, you can Special Summon 1 "Dormant Malice Token" (Fiend/DARK/ATK o/DEF/ o), with a Level equal to the amount of Malice counters on this card
